pattern_adherence.notes: Perfect response format, uses authenticate middleware exactly as shown in auth/overview.md, follows Router pattern from architecture/patterns.md.

completeness.notes: All requirements met: endpoint created, authentication enforced, correct HTTP method and path, returns user profile.

correctness.notes: Logic is correct, proper async/await, TypeScript types used correctly.

security.notes: Uses authenticate middleware, explicitly references anti-patterns.md for not returning passwordHash, shows exact GOOD pattern from docs.

consistency.notes: Matches existing route style perfectly, explicit comments referencing documentation sections, follows exact patterns shown.
